meanings.definition: The quality or state of being contemporary.
meanings.sent1: The contemporaneities of the new art exhibit truly showcase modern creativity.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed various contemporaneities, from paintings to sculptures.
meanings.sent3: The mix-up in the art gallery led to a hilarious display of contemporaneities.
meanings.sent4: Her fashion choices were a blend of classic elegance and trendy contemporaneities.
meanings.sent5: The city skyline was a beautiful blend of historical buildings and architectural contemporaneities.

meanings.definition: Events, people, or things that exist or occur at the same time.
meanings.sent1: In history class, we learned about the contemporaneities of the Renaissance period.
meanings.sent2: The museum exhibit showcased the contemporaneities of different cultures.
meanings.sent3: The party was a mix of contemporaneities, from music to fashion.
meanings.sent4: The meeting room was filled with the contemporaneities of various industries.
meanings.sent5: The park was bustling with the contemporaneities of nature and city life.
